channel.title: Help in item.cfg, im a noob but plz help :)
channel.description:
wow, my second time i need help, i seriously need help again with my tut, i need to change the bonuses of a weapon, lets say, whip, so i look up abyssal whip, i get it and then i try to figure out which bonus does what, but i cant, lol, on the top of the item.cfg file it says this: [code]//-----ShopID---ShopName[/code]
wtf?! right? thats the dam shop stuff, so can anyone please give me the [b]real[/b] thing that is supposed to be in there? lol tyvm if you try to help :)

item.title: Help in item.cfg, im a noob but plz help :)
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

oo, i see then wiat, i think i got it wrong
rofl w\e, ty both for help

Read full topic

item.title: Help in item.cfg, im a noob but plz help :)
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

the first 3 numbers are the prices the next 5 are the attack bonuses the next 5 are the def bonuses then the next 2 are str and pray

Read full topic

ohh tyvm… oh yea, there was buy and sell value, there was low alch and high alch value and then the bonuses, alright, tyvm ur the greatest rep++

item.title: Help in item.cfg, im a noob but plz help :)
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

I’m not sure about the values. All I know is that those values are for shops and alchs. The first 3 numbers are the values. The next 12 numbers are the bonuses.

item.title: Help in item.cfg, im a noob but plz help :)
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

That’s what it says in mine aswell… it doesn’t really matter. That’s just a name or headline in the cfg file. You can change it to whatever you like -

E.g.

//-----Item ID---Description---Value1---Value2---Value3---Stats

Read full topic
